cab.content: SECRET. Copy No. 31CP. 328 (29).CABINET.CLOSER UNION IN EAST AFRICA.Note by the Secretary of State for the Colonies.IN accordance with the wish expressed by the Prime Minister, I am circulating to my colleagues the accompanying copy of " Cmd. 1922," entitled " Indians in Kenya," and of " Cmd. 2904," entitled " Future Policy in regard to Eastern Africa."These documents were presented to Parliament in 1923 and 1927 respectively, and I hope that my colleagues may find an opportunity of considering them in connection with the present proposals for closer union in East Africa.P.Colonial Office, Downing Street, November 22, 1929.[20186]. -Printed for the Cabinet. November 1929.
